title: Java Level 6 â€” Methods & Reuse
concept: Defining and using methods, parameter passing, returning values.

challenges.title: Power Function
challenges.description: Write a method power(a, b) that returns a^b for non-negative integer b, using loops (no Math.pow). Read a and b, print a^b.

challenges.title: Is Prime (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method isPrime(n) which returns true if n is prime, false otherwise. Use it to print YES or NO.

challenges.title: Maximum of Array (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method maxArray(arr) that returns the maximum element of an integer array.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.title: Palindrome Number (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method isPalindrome(n) that returns true if the decimal representation of n is a palindrome.

challenges.title: Sum of Array (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method sumArray that returns the sum of all elements of an integer array.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.title: Digit Count (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method countDigits(n) that returns the number of digits in non-negative integer n.

challenges.title: Swap Values (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method swap(a, b) that prints the two integers in swapped order (b and then a).
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers: b and a, separated by space.

challenges.title: Minimum of Three (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method min3(a, b, c) that returns the minimum of three integers.

challenges.title: Reverse String (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method reverseString(s) that returns the reverse of a string.

challenges.title: Is Vowel (Method)
challenges.description: Write a method isVowel(c) which returns true if character c is a vowel (a, e, i, o, u in any case), false otherwise.
challenges.outputDescription: YES if c is vowel, NO otherwise.
